newsitem.title: USA: Xicor says plans Q2 inventory increase.
newsitem.headline: Xicor says plans Q2 inventory increase.

text.p: Xicor Inc said Thursday that it plans further inventory increases in the second quarter and its customers are optimistic about the second half of the year.
"Many customers worldwide, including Japan, have recently expressed an optimistic outlook for the second half of 1997," said president Raphael Klein.

"In light of these indications, we plan to further increase our inventories during the second quarter despite the risks associated with higher inventories. We believe that this business decision will allow us to effectively respond to orders requiring quick deliveries, which are needed to increase sales in the second quarter and the balance of the year," he said.
Klein said orders in the first quarter of 1997 increased substantially relative to the fourth quarter of 1996.
